meanings.definition: To represent in or reduce to a schematic form.
meanings.sent1: I will schematize the plan to make it easier to understand.
meanings.sent2: She likes to schematize her ideas before presenting them.
meanings.sent3: The teacher asked the students to schematize their thoughts on paper.
meanings.sent4: His mind seemed to schematize everything into neat categories.
meanings.sent5: The artist's goal was to schematize complex concepts into simple drawings.

meanings.definition: To arrange in a systematic order.
meanings.sent1: Let's schematize the tasks to complete them efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The librarian will schematize the books according to genre.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to schematize the ingredients for the recipe.
meanings.sent4: Her daily routine was schematized into a detailed schedule.
meanings.sent5: The manager schematized the workflow to improve productivity.
